NorthPanel.title: TopPanel-Title
NorthPanel.text: This panel contains the opponent's set of dice.

SouthPanel.title: BootomPanel-Title
SouthPanel.text: In this panel, you'll find your set of data, where you can select troops to deploy on the battlefield. The chosen troops are automatically arranged on the battlefield.

WestPanel.title: LeftPanel-Title
WestPanel.text: Here, the combat effectiveness of each troop is compared to the level of the opponent's troops. If two troops of the same level clash, they cancel each other out. However, if one troop has a higher level than the other, it prevails over the other.

EastPanel.title: RightPanel-Title
EastPanel.text: This panel provides information about the troops currently on the battlefield.

CenterPanel.title: CenterPanel-Title
CenterPanel.text: Within this panel, you'll find the battlefield,where deployed troops are automatically arranged. The outcome of the combat between one troop and another is displayed in the information panel.
